function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient focus on post-covid-19-infection effects on patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate tools for contact tracing and social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical staff using pulse oximeters can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between uses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using consumer-grade wearables to measure students’ anxiety and depression may lead to data privacy and security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in e-learning and use of iot in smart learning increases the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of shared wearable devices and smart technology in educational settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential barriers to wearables’ usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers to innovation due to regulatory procedures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multifunctional capabilities in wearables","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown and novel viruses with similar patterns and symptoms may emerge in the future, leading to the possibility of facing another pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious respiratory illnesses pose a persistent threat to global well-being.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed evidence and ongoing debate about the relationship between temperature and the spread of covid-19.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of environmental factors such as temperature, humidity, and uv radiation on virus survivability and transmission rates.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of sars-cov-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in the transmission potential of sars-cov-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries’ commitment to population health","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinformation on covid-19 transmission and risk factors related to climate and geography","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsubstantiated conclusions on the impact of heat and sunlight on sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on seasonal variations to contain sars-cov-2 spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis based on covid-19 cases per million inhabitants and country’s latitude could lead to oversimplified conclusions about disease propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data set of 117 countries may not be representative of global disease propagation patterns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to control for differential testing intensity may skew the analysis of disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reporting biases and incomplete coverage of testing approaches","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factors such as health infrastructure, socioeconomic background, and health supplies affecting the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive association between latitude and number of covid-19 cases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in covid-19 cases per million inhabitants with increase in absolute latitude","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible boost in covid-19 impact due to increasing temperatures and longer sunlight exposure during summer","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulated air travel may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing intensity can lead to underreporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited health expenditure may result in insufficient healthcare resources during a pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential increase in social interactions due to higher temperatures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises such as the covid-19 pandemic and economic depression increase susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nation-wide quarantines and lockdowns lead to economic impacts and social readjustment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant drops in energy and electricity demand due to pandemic-related closures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential second waves of covid-19 infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in household energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential recurring risk of pandemics exacerbated by climate change impacts","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
